title: THE HARD TRUTH
itunes:title: THE HARD TRUTH
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
THE HARD TRUTH about life! Success isn't overnight, greatness takes TIME! This is a powerful motivational speech featuring Pastor and Motivational Speaker Brian M. Bullock (https://bit.ly/BrianBullockMotiversity). The music is by Secession Studios (https://bit.ly/SecessionStudiosYouTube).

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
